comment: A finite simple graph with n vertices is complete iff it is (n-1)-regular. Hint: If the definition of ` RegGraph ` was allowed for ` k e. ZZ ` , then the assumption ` V =/= (/) ` could be removed. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 26-Dec-2020.)
